name: create-dodo-boilerplates
title: Create Dodo Boilerplates
description: Boilerplate code for a new project made in DoDo Framework.
author: Firstname Lastname

scripts.inst-win: rmdir /S /Q node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.build: vite build --config vite.options.js && vite build --config vite.action.js && vite build --config vite.content_scripts.js && vite build --config vite.background.js && vite build --config vite.dodoApp.js
